page.title: 18CHILDREN'S FUN/OWERMOIGNE
page.content: {AS A CHILD AGED 9 I WOULD LIKE TO:} GO CAMPING AND EXPLORE IN THE WOODS GO ICESKATING SWIMMING HORSE RIDING HAVE A BMX BIKE TO RIDE SEE OUR QUEEN VISIT A FARM AND KEEP CATS AND DOGS GO TO DISNEYLAND IN AMERICA GO TO A FAIR TAKE OVER THE RUNNING OF DAD'S FARM BECOME A COMPUTER EXPERT GO SKIING CLIMBING IN SWITZERLAND FLY ROUND THE WORLD IN CONCORDE GO INTO SPACE HAVE A LOT OF MONEY GO IN AN AIRCRAFT CARRIER HAVE A PLANE AND A HELICOPTER HAVE A PICNIC ON THE BEACH HAVE THE BEST TOYS IN ENGLAND SEE A FILM STAR IN HOLLYWOOD AMERICA VISIT MEDIEVAL ENGLAND VISIT A SPACE STATION VISIT A BUTTERFLY FARM
